articles.description: Paris St-Germain look like a team building a dynasty after Luis Enrique's team took apart yet another European giant - this time Real Madrid 4-0 - to reach the Club World Cup final.
articles.title: Club World Cup: A 'masterclass' from PSG - but problems for Real Madrid

articles.description: With doubts circling and England under serious pressure, the defending champions needed to step up - and they did.
articles.title: Sarina Wiegman delivers as Lionesses revive Euro 2025 hopes

articles.description: F1 correspondent Andrew Benson analyses Christian Horner's departure from Red Bull, a decision that was 18 months in the making.
articles.title: Christian Horner: Red Bull team principal departure analysis

articles.description: World number one Jannik Sinner says he will be "100%" for Friday's huge Wimbledon semi-final with Novak Djokovic after injuring his elbow.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Jannik Sinner says he will be '100%' fit for Novak Djokovic semi-final

articles.description: Wimbledon semi-finalist Belinda Bencic thinks up game plans while she's drifting off to sleep - tonight she will visualise beating Iga Swiatek.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: Belinda Bencic dreaming up game plan to beat Iga Swiatek

articles.description: Remco Evenepoel wins the individual time trial on stage five of the Tour de France as Tadej Pogacar takes the yellow jersey from Mathieu van der Poel.
articles.title: Tour de France 2025 results: Evenepoel wins stage five as Pogacar claims yellow jersey

articles.description: Jofra Archer and Jasprit Bumrah headline a thrilling third Test between England and India at Lord's, writes Stephan Shemilt
articles.title: England vs India: Jofra Archer and Jasprit Bumrah headline Lord's Test

articles.description: Reaction as Wales are beaten 4-1 in their  Euro 2025 group stage match with France in St Gallen, Switzerland.
articles.title: Wales vs France LIVE: Women's Euro 2025 score, stats, radio & updates

articles.description: Brazil manager Carlo Ancelotti is sentenced to a year in prison by a Spanish court for tax evasion - but he will not have to serve time in jail.
articles.title: Carlo Ancelotti handed Spanish prison sentence and fine for tax evasion but will not go to jail

articles.description: Manchester United want their new stadium to host the Women's World Cup final in 2035.
articles.title: Man Utd stadium news: Club aim to host 2035 Women's World Cup final
